name: Spider
tagline: A web spider written in Python. It takes a source, and spiders it for any links.
body:
## spider

![charlie, she so kawai](https://rawgithub.com/jmkogut/spider/master/charlotte.svg?raw=true)

A (hopefully) distributed application for spidering the web. I'm going to write a bunch more about this as time allows me to. LOOVE!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
